name: Medusa Destroyer
description: The medusa destroyer was a long range artillery hull that was different than other umbra in the basing sense people used blight atomic with apex impaler 3 to pierce through modules and destroy the base with the AOE from blight atomic.
obtaining: You can get the Medusa in T7 strikes or by hitting the Umbra Hunter(92) fleets in umbra deep space sector.
tips-builds: For the medusa is a baser only respectively since the anti pierce people would still do the apex 3 and blight atomic combo because nova missiles misses too much at long range.
author: Death And Taxes aka Fuck Hound
